TwinEditor.UI.ClosableTabControl

TwinEditor.UI.ClosableTabControl Class Reference

A UI control that provides the same functionality as TabControl, but also provides a way for the user to close certain tabs. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 ClosableTabControl (int firstClosableTabIndex)
 Constructor Initializes a new instance of CloseableTabControl whose first closable tab has the specified index.
 ClosableTabControl ()
 Default constructor Initializes a new instance of CloseableTabControl All tabs are closeable.

int FirstClosableTabIndex [get, set]
 Specifies which is the first tab that is closable.

Events

EventHandler< TabClosedEventArgs > TabClosed
 Occurs when the close context menu of a closeable tab has been clicked.

Detailed Description

A UI control that provides the same functionality as TabControl, but also provides a way for the user to close certain tabs.
